text: Math 257/316 Homework 1, 2025 Question 1: ODE Review Find the general solutions of the following equations: (a) y′′ − 2y′ + 2y = 0 (b) (1 − x)y′ = y ln y (c) y′′ − 4y′ + 4y = sin x + x2 (d) (1 + x2)y′ + 2xy = 1 (e) 2x2y′′ − xy′ + y = x1/2 (f) x2y′′ − xy′ + y = 0 (g) x2y′′ − xy′ + 5y = x2 Question 2: Power Series Solution Consider the following linear ODEs: (1) y′ + (1 + x)y = 0 (2) y′′ + 4y = 0 a. Use the methods you learned for solving ODEs to solve equations (1) and (2). b. Expand the solutions to equations (1) and (2) as Taylor series about the point x0 = 0. c. Now, for each of equations (1) and (2), assume a power series solution of the form: y(x) = ∞∑ n=0 anxn Obtain a recursion for the coeﬃcients an. Use these recursions to deter- mine the series representation of each solution. Compare these results to the series obtained in part (b) above. 1
